descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...Two horizontal black lines and two vertical black lines placed such that nine blue squares. There are single squares of other colors within some of the blue squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to....copy the input. For single colored squares of the same color: add another single square of the same color in the same relative location in between  the other two. Do this for all colors.

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to....copy the input. For single colored squares of the same color: add another single square of the same color in the same relative location in between  the other two. Do this for all colors.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...nine blocks in rows of three, up and down, with colored patterns.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make each across and down row identical, matching the middle block in each row to the end blocks.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...blue, black and green pixels. the black pixels formed a cross shape touching one another. green pixels placed on the black pixels
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same size as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...replace some of the blue and or green pixels with either orange or yellow colors

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...3 block
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...replace similar block

descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...replace similar block

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...input blue
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...yellow and red
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...grid collected

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a 9x9 grid with two green colored squares.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make the square at 4 across, 5 down green.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... You should see 9 blue blocks of the same size... two of these blocks carry a green square.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is identical
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make the middle block between the unique blocks, a mirror of them.
